query:
-- Verificar se há IDs faltando (indicando deleções)
SELECT 
  'Mercados' as entidade,
  MIN(id) as id_minimo,
  MAX(id) as id_maximo,
  COUNT(*) as registros_atuais,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) as registros_esperados,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) - COUNT(*) as registros_deletados
FROM mercados_unicos

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Clientes' as entidade,
  MIN(id) as id_minimo,
  MAX(id) as id_maximo,
  COUNT(*) as registros_atuais,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) as registros_esperados,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) - COUNT(*) as registros_deletados
FROM clientes

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Concorrentes' as entidade,
  MIN(id) as id_minimo,
  MAX(id) as id_maximo,
  COUNT(*) as registros_atuais,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) as registros_esperados,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) - COUNT(*) as registros_deletados
FROM concorrentes

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Leads' as entidade,
  MIN(id) as id_minimo,
  MAX(id) as id_maximo,
  COUNT(*) as registros_atuais,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) as registros_esperados,
  (MAX(id) - MIN(id) + 1) - COUNT(*) as registros_deletados
FROM leads;
